items.title: Stop experiments and get manager who fits Man Utd DNA - Neville
items.summary: Gary Neville urges Manchester United to 'stop experimenting' and appoint a manager who fits the club's DNA after Ruben Amorim was sacked on Monday.

items.title: FC Volendam brengt te weinig opwinding voor het vijandelijke doel
items.summary: Na een relatief korte winterstop gaat vrijdag de Eredivisie weer verder. Tot diep in maart is er elk weekeinde een speelronde. Met andere woorden: het cruciale deel van het seizoen gaat beginnen. In deze serie maken we bij elke club de balans op, waarbij we wat betreft de volgorde uitgaan van de eerste speelronde van 2026. Deze keer: FC Volendam.

items.title: Manchester United undecided on next managerial move after sacking Ruben Amorim
items.summary: Head coach goes after outburst at Leeds game Glasner and Iraola among long-term candidates Ruben Amorim was sacked by Manchester United on Monday morning after 14 months as their head coach. He departs after a power struggle with the hierarchy over transfer policy, with Amorim demanding his ¬≠colleagues in the recruitment department ‚Äúdo their job‚Äù following Sunday‚Äôs draw at Leeds. His immediate replacement is Darren Fletcher, who takes charge as interim head coach. The Scot, a former United midfielder and the ¬≠current under-18s coach, will lead the side at Burnley on Wednesday and could remain in charge for Sunday‚Äôs FA Cup tie with Brighton. Continue reading...

items.title: Wintertransfers Eredivisie seizoen 2025/26: alle clubs op een rij
items.summary: De transferperiode is weer losgebarsten. In dit overzicht van VI vind je alle afgeronde, door clubs bevestigde, wintertransfers van de achttien Eredivisie-clubs. Clubs in Nederland kunnen tot en met 3 februari spelers aantrekken.

items.title: Heerenveen heeft beet en betaalt geen afkoopsom voor nieuwe linksbuiten
items.summary: SC Heerenveen heeft Luca Oyen (22) binnen. De Friezen maken bekend dat de linksbuiten transfervrij is overgenomen van RC Genk en zijn handtekening heeft gezet onder een contract tot de zomer van 2029.

items.title: 'Appointing Nancy one of clueless Celtic's greatest blunders'
items.summary: There is "no apparent big picture view at Celtic", argues BBC Sport Scotland's Tom English as Wilfried Nancy and Paul Tisdale exit the ailing champions.

items.title: Difficult questions loom for Manchester United higher-ups after Amorim‚Äôs axing | Jamie Jackson
items.summary: Fallout from a dour and unsuccessful reign will hit well-paid executives who backed the outgoing head coach Ruben Amorim‚Äôs tenure as Manchester United head coach began its final unravelling via four words uttered in Friday‚Äôs media conference to preview the weekend trip to Leeds. ‚ÄúYou are very smart,‚Äù was Amorim‚Äôs signoff to this correspondent‚Äôs last question regarding if the Portuguese had been informed of a change in the January transfer budget by Jason Wilcox, the director of football. The question was asked in reaction to Amorim‚Äôs odd comment on Christmas Eve that he was beginning to ‚Äúunderstand‚Äù the finance was not available to sign the footballers needed to ‚Äúplay a perfect 3-4-3‚Äù. Hearing this, the radar bleeped red ‚Äì Amorim was clearly countenancing changing from a system he was quasi-obsessed with. Continue reading...

items.title: Dick Voormekaar Podcast Extra: 'Gegoochel met aanvoerdersband moest eens klaar zijn'
items.summary: Feyenoord-watcher Martijn Krabbendam geeft in deze Dick Voormekaar Podcast Extra een update uit het trainingskamp van Feyenoord. Hij heeft het met Sjoerd Keizer over de aanvoerderskwestie, mogelijke transfers, de positie van Robin van Persie en de omstandigheden in Marbella.

items.title: Amorim out as Man Utd coach after 14 months
items.summary: Ruben Amorim has been sacked by Manchester United from his role as head coach.

items.title: Salah goal seals Egypt's spot in AFCON quarters
items.summary: Egypt advanced to the AFCON quarterfinals on Monday with a 3-1 win over Benin, but they needed extra time to get there in a bruising encounter that saw the Cheetahs throw everything they had at Mohamed Salah and co.

items.title: Man City's Gvardiol to have surgery on broken leg
items.summary: Manchester City have confirmed that Josko Gvardiol has suffered a leg fracture and is set to undergo surgery this week.

items.title: Endrick: Ancelotti said to leave Madrid for Lyon
items.summary: Brazilian forward Endrick took advice from his former Real Madrid coach Carlo Ancelotti before joining French club Lyon on loan for the rest of the season.

items.title: Unpacking Man City-Chelsea, Joan Garcia stars for Barca, Amorim out at Man United
items.summary: Man City might think they "controlled" Sunday's draw with Chelsea, but dropped points is all that matters. That and more as Gab Marcotti recaps the weekend.

items.title: O'Neill returns to Celtic for rest of season
items.summary: Martin O'Neill is returning to Celtic as manager for the remainder of the season following the dismissal of Wilfried Nancy.

items.title: Manchester United‚Äôs flawed process: why Amorim appointment was doomed from the start
items.summary: Systemic failures at Old Trafford led them to the wrong man last time around ‚Äì and there is concern that those problems remain When Manchester United embarked upon this season full of fresh hope and optimism, there was an unexpected note of caution from one of the best executives in the game. ‚ÄúIt‚Äôs clear they don‚Äôt have a process,‚Äù the executive said of Sir Jim Ratcliffe‚Äôs new regime early in the season. It was a stark pronouncement at odds with the consensus that Ruben Amorim, with a proper pre-season to bed in his tactical system and exciting signings, would be able to demonstrate his considerable abilities unencumbered by the hospital pass he had been given on his appointment in November 2024. Continue reading...

items.title: 'A failure from the manager and the club' | Neville gives verdict on Amorim sacking
items.summary: Watch the best bits from Gary Neville's reaction to the news of Ruben Amorim's sacking by Manchester United.

items.title: 'The experiments have to stop' - Neville explains who next Man Utd boss must be
items.summary: Man Utd must appoint an experienced manager who fits the DNA of the club, says Gary Neville, insisting "the experiments have got to stop".

items.title: Nuno: West Ham need a mentality shift... and more signings
items.summary: Two days on from West Ham's defeat by Wolves at Molineux, Nuno Espirito Santo is still finding it difficult to get his head around his side's first-half collapse. Why did it go so badly wrong?
